column1: Cuando era niño; jugaba al fútbol
column2: When I was a child; I used to play soccer

column1: Yo iré a la playa mañana
column2: I will go to the beach tomorrow
I would like to go to Spain

column1: Espero que tengas un buen día
column2: I hope you have a good day

column1: Me levanto a las seis de la mañana
column2: I get up at six in the morning

column1: Trabajo por el dinero/Esto es para ti
column2: I work for money/This is for you
I will have finished by five

column1: Habría ido si hubiera tenido tiempo
column2: I would have gone if I had had time

column1: La chica que vive aquí es mi amiga
column2: The girl who lives here is my friend
